snippet: Arming police officers with AK-47s led to an accidental shooting and the theft of a weapon — and to the resignation of the interior minister,
abstract: Decision to equip Lithuanian police with AK-47s leads to accidental shooting, theft of weapon by drug suspect and resignation of Interior Minister, who was asleep during manhunt.
lead_paragraph: Arming police officers with AK-47s led to an accidental shooting and the theft of a weapon — and to the resignation of the interior minister,

headline.print_headline: Europe; Lithuania: Misfires at AK-47’s Debut
